standard.name: Standard Packaging
standard.description: This is the typical packaging we’re all used to — nothing fancy, but not the greenest.
standard.impact: Uses the most plastic and energy. It's reliable but has the highest footprint.

minimal.name: Minimal Packaging
minimal.description: Simplified and smart — it uses less material while keeping your items safe.
minimal.impact: Cuts plastic by 40% and uses fully recyclable alternatives.

tote.name: Reusable Tote
tote.description: A sturdy bag designed to be used again and again — goodbye single-use!
tote.impact: Saves 52% emissions and replaces hundreds of plastic bags over time.

grouped.name: Grouped Delivery
grouped.description: Orders are bundled with nearby customers to minimize transport emissions.
grouped.impact: Up to 68% less CO₂ and fewer delivery vehicles on the road.

emissionFacts: 🚚 Grouped delivery can lower your carbon footprint by up to 68%.
🛍️ A single reusable tote can replace over 1,000 plastic bags in its lifetime.
♻️ Minimal packaging cuts down material use by 40% — smart and sustainable.
🌍 Reusable options like totes eliminate over half of single-use plastic waste.
